overview: Horny married cop Duke Miller just can't get enough of man-on-man action. Whether he's fucking horny college delinquent Caesar, or giving up his own muscular ass to beer-can dicked Tuck Johnson in a steamy three-way, this 24-year-old mountain of muscle wants it all. See Duke's fellow officers use each other's straight holes in and out of uniform. Very hardcore, with lots of deep kissing, rimming, ass-stretching and three-ways - all in uniform!
tagline: Sometimes the code of silence is stronger than the bond of matrimony.
title: Married Cops Do
